data.description:
Now with improved graphics on Meta Quest 3!

Cave Digger is a mining adventure game taking place in a small town in an alternative Western universe full of mystery, dark humor, and experimental tools for the brave miner! Discover secrets, easter eggs, and multiple endings!

Gear up to explore the town and the depths of the mountain. Excavate bedrock with your hard swings, reap the rewards of Mother Earth, and trade mined valuables for new gadgets. Outside of the saloon, a town in ruin awaits its savior! Fix the train to enter the mines and dig deeper than any miner before you!

How much riches will be enough? Will you be able to stop? What happens if you donâ€™t? The answers and more will be found at the bottom of the mines!

Features
-Explore the elevator shaft and four massive train levels full of mysteries, riches, and strange encounters
-Build the way up to the mines by gearing up your train and tools
-9 unique endings
-Meet a companion to help to carry the weight on your shoulders

For the latest updates, insider peeks and 24/7 Saloon talks (memes)
-> discord.gg/cavedigger

Check also the other titles of the franchise below

- The sequel Cave Digger 2 Dig Harder includes the first-ever crossplay at this scale: pretty much all platforms in both VR & standard gaming!
www.oculus.com/experiences/app/4687168774709280

- Cave Digger Room Wrecker is the first title in the series that uses the groundbreaking MR features on Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest Pro!
www.oculus.com/experiences/app/9134489056624428
